title: Google Play Store reportedly hit 28.3 billion app downloads in Q1 2022, led by Instagram
content:
According to a new report, the Google Play Store drove an increase in the number of app downloaded during the first quarter of 2022, and to no one’s surprise it was TikTok that led the charge.

more…

The post Google Play Store reportedly hit 28.3 billion app downloads in Q1 2022, led by Instagram appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A new report shows the most popular Android apps as of Q1 2022, with Instagram and TikTok battling it out on the Google Play Store and more.
